content: Remember to take control of the battlefield, and dictate where the fighting happens by luring him away from any lingering frost field that tend to stay longer than you'd expect. He'll always end up coming to you, so back up and be ready to retaliate when he lunges forth.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang' and the sub-subsection 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Remember to take control of the battlefield, and dictate where the fighting happens by luring him away from any lingering frost field that tend to stay longer than you'd expect. He'll always end up coming to you, so back up and be ready to retaliate when he lunges forth.
